amendment.description: Page 6, line 18, strike "or". Page 6, after line 18 insert the following (and redesignate the subsequent subclause accordingly): (II) has knowingly transported items used to establish in Syria a permanent military presence of either Iranian military forces or Iranian backed militia; or.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-463 to include, in the report already required in the underlying text, certification that the transaction will not benefit an Iranian person that has knowingly transported items used to establish in Syria a permanent military presence of either Iranian military forces or Iranian backed militia.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gaetz.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Gaetz amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
